questiontext.text:
It was determined of 200 people whether they were left- or right-handed, and how well they are artistically developed (good, moderate, poor). The results are shown in the cross tabulation below.

————– ————————- ——- ——– Artistic development Good Moderate Poor Right-handed 42 72 56 Left-handed 18 8 4 ————– ————————- ——- ——–

Given the following two assertions about these data:______________. 1: Left-handedness and right-handedness are independent, because P(right-handed ∩ left-handed) = 0. 2: Being artistically well-developed and left-handedness are independent because P(left-handed ∩ artistically well developed) = P(artistically well developed). Which of these statements is correct?

feedback.text: Assertions 1 and 2 are both correct: Incorrect

answer.text: Assertion 1 is true, assertion 2 is false.

feedback.text: Assertion 1 is correct, assertion 2 is incorrect: Incorrect

answer.text: Assertion 1 is false, assertion 2 is true.

feedback.text: Assertion 1 is incorrect, assertion 2 is correct: Incorrect
Assertions 1 and 2 are both incorrect: Correct
